website_summaries.verdict: Made with pure caffeine, this comes with roller beads on the applicator to help massage the cream into the skin.
pros: Leaves a highly tingly feeling that feels like a spa treatment
It absorbs quickly and leaves no trace
Plumps up the skin to help improve that orange peel look while also tightening up sagging areas
cons: It can be difficult to get the product out — the tube needs a hard squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product exactly as directed for 4 weeks now. There has been no reduction in the appearance at all. It does make my skin feel softer but that’s it. I’ve even been using a cellulite messager with it. I’m a thin person with only a small area of cellulite that I wanted to improve but this product isn’t doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Capozzi

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Made skin soft but otherwise not very impressed. Actually I need to return it as it was a bit more expensive on here anyway
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 3 weeks, twice a day. I have not noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bornbach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this product again. The roller ball applicator fell off when I tried to turn cap. There was evidence of some temporary tightness when I applied cream to my skin. Now I have to squeeze product from tube. There needs to be a better system for packaging this product. Too expensive and I have lost interest. Probably will use on neck.
customer_reviews.author: Talibear792

customer_reviews.title: Did not see any changes
customer_reviews.text: I like dr. brandt I use their face moisturizers. This product however did not live up to its promise. I have used this product for almost a month and I have not seen any changes. I decided to use it only on my right thigh so I could compare it to my left thigh and they still look the same. The smell didn't bother me and the cream didn't irritate my skin. The reason why I gave it two stars is that it did make my skin feel softer and moisturized. Unfortunately I can not recommend this item based only on the fact that my thigh feels softer.
customer_reviews.author: Summeroz

customer_reviews.title: Suble, but it seems to work
customer_reviews.text: It burns and mildly irritates skin in the beginning, but if you are not allergic to the product it becomes better as you continue using it. It also doesn't give instant result. I tested on my left leg (which is usually bigger than right leg) for a week and started to see the difference. Left leg where I used started to look smoother and better than right leg. I also used for my stomach to make it smooth. The result is very subtle, but I it looks smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem to work at for me...
customer_reviews.text: This one has been a struggle for me to use. It smells terrible... kind of like Gold Bond powder. I could tolerate the smell if I felt it was working, but after weeks of application, all that I notice is skin irritation. It's application goes on easy enough, you twist the top to the ON position and the lotion flows out using roller balls. This might work for others, but it has not worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: MKinz

customer_reviews.title: modest improvement, pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this item, but I'm not there yet. I'm a fan of dr. brandt products generally, as I find a little goes a long way and they usually work very well. To be honest, I'm not noticing a ton of improvement, although I am noticing some decrease in cellulite. For some, the modest improvements may justify the price, especially if they don't have much cellulite to banish. I do enjoy the process. The applicator feels nice and does a good job of massaging, and I enjoy the scent, which reminds me of being in a good spa. Thankfully the scent doesn't linger as a perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizing, but no notiecable toning/tightening
customer_reviews.text: Cellusculpt is an effective moisturizer, but my experience didn't yield any other effects- no detectable toning or tightening. As such, I can't defend its high price- especially since I think it's predicated largely on the roller-ball application mechanism, which isn't really necessary for application (rubbing the lotion in manually works equally well). As I said, it DOES moisturize well, but equally effective moisturizer products can be purchased for much less. Your results may vary, but I didn't see any tightening or toning effects.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M. Tannenbaum

customer_reviews.title: I Did Not See Many If Any Results
customer_reviews.text: While this product goes on easily and has a reassuring medicinal smell that makes you believe this product might actually get rid of cellulite I at least have not seen that much in the way of results. Granted I am fifty something and have been overweight at times in my life so maybe I am just too tough of a customer for dr. brandt. But personally I would not spend almost $60 a tube to give this any more trials.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite vanishing.
customer_reviews.text: Cellulite is vanishing. I will buy this again! Love the roller ball and click dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mendez
